question.text: Which of the following pair of assisted reproductive techniques involves in-vivo fertilisation?

options.text: <math><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">U</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">U</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi></math>

solution.text: Test Tube baby programme involves in-vitro fertilisation followed by zygote/embryo transfer inside the female body either through <math><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">U</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi></math>. <math><mtext>ICSI</mtext></math> is another specialised procedure to form an embryo in the lab or in vitro.
